    Reference

    All functions

    STOMcontrol-class

    An s4 class for Control object for stomach compilation.

    add_Aphia_ID()

    Add WoRMS Aphia Id Add WoRMS Aphia Id to predator or prey species where missing.

    add_NODC_ID()

    Add NODC Id where missing

    add_missing_boots()

    Add missing prey and prey size combination for bootstrap replicates

    add_strata()

    Add temporal and spatial strata to STOMobs

    aggregate_within_sample()

    Aggregate stomach contents within sample

    as.data.frame(<STOMdiet>)

    Convert STOMdiet into a data.frame

    as.data.frame(<STOMobs>)

    Convert a STOMobs into a data.frame

    as_STOMdiet()

    Convert a data.frame into a STOMdiet object

    as_STOMobs()

    Convert a data.frame into a STOMobs object

    bias_correct_energy_etc()

    Bias correct stomach content due to energy contents, armament etc.

    bias_correct_regurgitated()

    Bias correct due to regurgitated stomachs

    bootsMean()

    Statistics from bootstrap replicates.

    bootstrap_addVar()

    Add bootstrap stratification variables.

    bootstrap_data()

    Make bootstrap replicates.

    bootstrap_show()

    Show bootstrap stratification.

    c(<STOMdiet>)

    Combine multiple STOMdiet objects

    c(<STOMobs>)

    Combine multiple STOMobs objects

    calc_population_stom()

    Compilation of observed stomach contents into population diet

    change_data()

    Make changes on STOMobs from user options

    check_before_strata_aggregation()

    Check if data are ready for aggregation.

    check_unique_diet_id()

    Check uniqueness of diet_id (key)

    check_unique_sample_id()

    Check uniqueness of sample_id and fish_id

    cleanup()

    close open devices

    combine_years()

    Combine years of stomach data.

    convert_year_of_the_stomach()

    Read ICES year-of-the-stomach data

    diet_prey_to_other()

    Transform preys into "other"

    diet_relative()

    Calculate diet data as relative weight

    diet_sum()

    Sum diet data with the same prey

    do_detailed_output()

    Show a subset from test criteria

    do_detailed_output_diet()

    Show a subset from test criteria

    edit_control()

    Edit control attribute

    from_to_species_diet()

    Change predator or prey names.

    get_control()

    Get control attribute

    group_prey_species()

    Group prey species names.

    make_criteria_set()

    Extract a subset from test criteria

    make_from_to_species()

    Read csv-file with allocation keys for partly identified prey species.

    make_length_classess()

    Put size classes on predator from observed length.

    make_template_strata_weighting()

    Make a template for weighting factors for population diet.

    model_output()

    Produce input for the SMS model.

    plot(<STOMdiet>)

    Plot diet data.

    plotSize()

    Plot diet data.

    plotboots()

    Plot bootstrapping diet data.

    plotboots.size()

    Plot bootstrapping diet data.

    plotdif()

    Plot difference between two diet data set.

    prey_w_from_pooled_weight()

    Allocate weight to individual prey lengths from prey-pooled weights

    print(<STOMcontrol>)

    Print control object

    print(<STOMdiet>)

    Print overview of diet data

    print(<STOMobs>)

    Print STOMobs

    put_size_class_on_predator()

    Put size classes on predator from observed length.

    put_size_class_on_prey()

    Put size classes on preys from observed length.

    read_exchange_data()

    Read stomach contents data on exchange format

    redist_unidentified_prey_lengths()

    Redistribute unidentified prey lengths

    redist_unidentified_prey_sp()

    Redistribute unidentified prey species

    strata_aggregate()

    Aggregate stomach contents within strata (time, area and sub-area)

    subset(<STOMdiet>)

    Sub-setting a STOMdiet object.

    subset(<STOMobs>)

    Sub-setting a STOMobs object.

    summary(<STOMdiet>)

    Summary of diet

    summary(<STOMobs>)

    Summary of number of stomachs

    table_strata_prey_preyl()

    Table stomach contents within by strata (time, area and sub-area)

    update(<STOMobs>)

    Update attributes with added variables

    validSTOMcontrol()

    Validation of control object used for stomach data compilation.

    write_exchange_data()

    Write stomach contents data of class STOMobs on the exchange format.
